argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hosd1.2 | |- T : ~H --> ~H |
| 2 |  | hosd1.3 | |- U : ~H --> ~H |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_hosd1i | |- ( T +op U ) = ( T -op ( 0hop -op U ) ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_hodidi | |- ( U -op U ) = 0hop |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( U -op U ) -op U ) = ( 0hop -op U ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( T -op ( ( U -op U ) -op U ) ) = ( T -op ( 0hop -op U ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( T +op U ) = ( T -op ( ( U -op U ) -op U ) ) |
